text: Watch the World may refer to: * Watch the World (The Little Heroes album), an album by Australian band Little Heroes (band), (1983). ** "Watch the World (song)", taken from the Little Heroes album, Watch the World. * "Watch the World", a song from the 2002 album Box Car Racer * Watch the World, a 2016 album by Markus Schulz *Watch the World, a 1950-1951 magazine-style television documentary show on American network NBC hosted by John Cameron Swayze and Don Goddard.
title: Watch the World
